think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob 'enable_partitionwise_join' in PostgreSQL documentation to understand its function and possible values. 2. Review the possible settings for the knob to determine if any of the values deviate from a regular numerical progression or have special operational effects. 3. Analyze if any of these values significantly alter the behavior of the system or disable a feature, which would classify it as a 'special knob'.
